newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi beheads Afghan for smuggling heroin.
newsitem.headline: Saudi beheads Afghan for smuggling heroin.

text.p: Saudi Arabia on Friday beheaded an Afghan man for smuggling heroin into the kingdom, the Saudi Interior Ministry said.
A ministry statement carried by the official Saudi Press Agency said the man was executed in the Red Sea port-city of Jeddah.
The execution brings to 50 the number of people put to death this year in Saudi Arabia, which enforces Islamic sharia law by publicly beheading convicted murders, smugglers and rapists.
